column1: '''Henry Bradley''' ([[3 December]] [[1845]] – [[23 May]] [[1923]]) was senior editor of the ''[[Oxford English Dictionary]]'' (OED). Bradley was [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s supervisor on the OED.<ref>{{CG|C}}
Tolkien wrote an obituary for Bradley
column2: published in the [[Bulletin of the Modern Humanities Research Association 20|''Bulletin of the Modern Humanities Research Association''
column4: in October 1923.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=11840|articlename=Bulletin of the Modern Humanities Research Association. 1923|dated=|website=TB|accessed=13 April 2014}}</ref>

column1: *[http://blog.oxforddictionaries.com/2013/07/henry-bradley/ Henry Bradley: ‘sméaþoncol mon’] at the Oxforddictionaries.com
